_comment: config file for training from a single mesh: initial code setup and test from single mesh
_: _ before variable is for a comment
_is_shapenet: set it to true if training on shapenet dataset else set it to false
_use_uv_layout_encoder: set it to true if we want to use encoder for uv_layout and concatenate with noise vector
_debug: set it to true to look for intermediate rendering during training else set it to false
_gan_only: set it to true if we want to train from only gan_loss else will train from both gan_loss and l1_loss
_l1_weight: weight for l1 loss between image rendered with synthetic texture and image rendered with original texture
_gan_weight: weight for gan loss between image rendered with synthetic texture and image rendered with original texture
_obj_path: if not shapenet_path: specify the obj path
_stylegan2: set it to true to use stylegan2 generator and discriminator instead of DCGAN generator and discriminator
_stylegan2_configs: following parameters are for stylegan2 generator and discriminator
_mesh_approximation: set to true if we want to use approximate mesh instead of actual mesh
